unidade: Escola de Artes, Ciências e Humanidades
objetivos:
This is a course intended to introduce the international economics related to trade
policies and regional economic integration and its application to the world global
business by analysis of the trade barriers’ impacts, by discussion of differences in
trade policies between industrialized economies and developing economies and by
explaining the benefits and costs of establishing regional trading arrangements.
programa_resumido:
Instruments of Trade Policy (tariff and nontariff barriers), Trade Policies,
Economics of International Integration

turmas.observacoes:
Disciplina ministrada em inglês.
Prédio I1 - Térreo - Sala T04
